Reviews.Title: a great idea
Reviews.Author: mannyfleissner
Reviews.Content: this is a great idea but this product is very cheaply made - i rebuilt it and have had it installed for some time now and it functions as it should have from the beginning - i might buy another one knowing that it needed some work before i could install and use it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Lane
Reviews.Content: Cheap plastic.  I don't think it would fool anyone.  I may use it in the garage where it will be long forgotten.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Wm
Reviews.Content: Item has limited space for small items.  However, looks good and does a great job.  works as listed and does what it is intended to do.

Reviews.Title: Its not quite what was described....
Reviews.Author: Steel
Reviews.Content: The product is as described however it fails to mention that you have to be willing and able to cut a decent size hole in the wall. The specifications say do not use an actual electrical outlet already installed with wiring, well duh... but to make a hole big enough to fit it would in most peoples cases that rent their homes would void their security deposit. Now if u got to choose colors that would be the only suggstion to make it more agreeable for households.

Reviews.Title: flimsy
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of them for family as a gift to help secure items since burglary is picking up due to all the drugs. I had no idea these would be a flimsy as they are.  While I think they will serve the purpose, they are not sturdy at all.

Reviews.Title: hide a hole  in the wall
Reviews.Author: boatsnboards
Reviews.Content: I recently tried to install a new electrical outlet in a dining room wall. Unfortunately, the electrical wire could not be pulled through to the site of the new hole. Since I could not match the paint and re-finishing the drywall to conceal the error would be time consuming, the Hidden Wall Safe was a perfect solution. Two minutes and the hole is now an elecrtrical outlet in appearance anyways. The added bonus that I can hide things is there as well!

Reviews.Title: very real
Reviews.Author: h2olily
Reviews.Content: This is the neatest hiding place I have ever seen it is very easy to install and looks very real!

ProductInfo.Features:
Features include:it looks like an electrical outlet but it is a great place to hide your valuables
High impact plastic and metal; once installed it pivots out to reveal the secret hiding place
Comes with cutout saw and template for easy installation in just minutes
ProductInfo.Name: Trademark Home Hidden Wall Safe
